H0.text: What play was President Lincoln watching the night he was assassinated in 1865. Our American Cousin

H1.text: What play was President Lincoln watching the night he was assassinated in 1865. Hamlet

H2.text: What play was President Lincoln watching the night he was assassinated in 1865. Macbeth

H3.text: What play was President Lincoln watching the night he was assassinated in 1865. Sockdologizing

A4.text: Our American Cousin became notorious as the play that U.S. president Abraham Lincoln was attending in Ford's Theatre in Washington, D.C. when he was assassinated by John Wilkes Booth

A5.text: Well, I guess I know enough to turn you inside out, old gal â€“ you sockdologizing old man-trap!
